text: Guarapari Esporte Clube, commonly known as Guarapari, is a Brazilian football club based in Guarapari, Espírito Santo state. They competed in the Série B once. ==History== The club was founded on June 12, 1936. They won the Campeonato Capixaba in 1987. They competed in the Série B in 1983, when they were eliminated in the First Stage of the competition. ==Achievements== * Campeonato Capixaba: ** Winners (1): 1987 ==Stadium== Guarapari Esporte Clube play their home games at Estádio Davino Mattos. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 3,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1936 Category:Defunct football clubs in Espírito Santo Category:1936 establishments in Brazil
title: Guarapari Esporte Clube
